post.summary: Add/Update an address for a user
post.description: Add/Update an address for a user. For addressType 'Home', which is default address, postal code cannot be changed

delete.summary: Delete an address of a user
delete.description: Delete an address of a user. Address with addressType 'Home' cannot be deleted

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
